User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

This is a suggestion to add Alt+Shift+Left/Right as shortcuts to drop down the back/forward menu. Currently this is only possible by mouse.

Alternatively, if the keyboard shortcut is undesired, an alternative would be to add the menu as a sub-menu somewhere within the History menu and/or the page’s right-click menu so that it is accessible by keyboard.
